name: Allentown, Pennsylvania Hotel
mark: 0.7 km from Dorney Park Wildwater Kingdom
description: This Allentown, Pennsylvania hotel is located across the street from Dorney Park amusement park and Wild Water Kingdom. Some rooms feature a view of Dorney Park.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Allentown Lehigh Valley
mark: 7.3 km from Dorney Park Wildwater Kingdom
description: Four Points by Sheraton Allentown Lehigh Valley is located across from Dorney Park & Wildwater Kingdom theme park, and it is nearby Cedar Crest College, Muhlenberg College, DeSales University.

name: Kings Head
mark: Situated on the village green in Lanchester
description: Situated on the village green in Lanchester, the King’s Head is in a traditional village setting just 7 minutes’ drive from Durham.

name: The Bull Inn Walsingham
description: Located in Little Walsingham, The Bull Inn Walsingham features a restaurant, bar, garden, and free WiFi. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom.

name: The Mendip Inn Opens in new window
mark: 7.3 km from Dorney Park Wildwater Kingdom
description: Situated in Binegar, The Mendip Inn has a restaurant, bar, shared lounge, and free WiFi. At the inn, the rooms are fitted with a desk and a TV.
